averycowan.checkers

Class King

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      • averycowan.checkers.Checker
        • averycowan.checkers.King

  • public class King
extends Checker
    This class defines the properties of a checker piece once it gets promoted to a king.
